full_summary:
[Title] Android Scanners Plus Kits for Library and Archives Canada
=====================================

**Reference Number:** WS3617150079-Doc3617150135  
**Tender Closing Date:** December 23, 2022, at 14:00 (Eastern Standard Time)  
**Solicitation Number:** WS3617150079  
**Publication Date:** October 28, 2022  
**Expected Contract Start Date:** December 2, 2022  
**Expected Contract End Date:** Ongoing

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)  
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding  
**Trade Agreements:** The [contracting entity name] has the option to utilize the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and other international trade agreements, which may affect the bidders' eligibility.

**Tender Summary:**
The [contracting entity name] invites tenderers to submit a bid for the procurement of thirty (30) Android Scanners plus accessories to be delivered to Library and Archives Canada in Ottawa, Ontario. The tender closing date has been modified to December 23, 2022 at 2:00 p.m. (Eastern Standard Time), and all required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by this time.

**Bid Review and Evaluation:** The [contracting entity name] will evaluate the qualifications of tenderers and bid submissions based on the lowest price. Tenderers must provide all required supporting documentation, including proof of expertise, certification, and experience in delivering similar products and services.

**Delivery Region:** The successfully selected tenderer will be required to deliver the Android Scanners plus accessories to the Library and Archives Canada located in Ottawa, Ontario.

**Evaluation Criteria:** Tenderers must provide accurate and detailed quotations, and the evaluation will be based on the lowest price.

**Prospective Bidders:** Tenderers interested in submitting a bid must review the solicitation documents thoroughly and ensure that their bids are complete and accurately priced.

**Clarification and Questions:** Any clarifications or questions may be directed to [contracting entity address] or by contacting Veronica Vallejo at [contact information].

Note: This entry aims to highlight the most important and relevant details from the original document while ensuring a professional tone and format. Key information, such as the tender closing date and procurement method, has been emphasized, while extraneous details have been omitted. The rewritten entry also includes key phrases, such as "Notice Type" and "Procurement Method," for greater clarity.  There is no special formatting used
